description:
Cole was in town doing an unpaid internship. He had been here a while and was just completing the internship Days before having to return home, he got it in his head he could do some porn to compensate for the unpaid work.
He saw I was local, and sent me an email saying he was down for a video, but we would have to move quickly.
Airfare is outrageous these days, and with the porn industry shrinking dramatically, I figured I may as well get this cute kid in for a quickie, and those of you who love the young and lean would enjoy some Boy Time.
He has 'twink' written all over him, and he seemed eager to show-off his perfectly straight 7" Italian cock. He is gay, and though he has only been with one guy, he had bottomed for him and really loved it.
I wish all my shoots went so smoothly. He was one of those dudes that every time he had to take his pants off, his cock would stand at attention. He seemed embarrassed by it, but I of course was super pleased.
He nuts while on his knees and gets some amazing distance!
As I mentioned before, he pretty much decided to do this last minute before leaving town for good, so next week he will be back to get a Servicing from me. It has an 'interesting' ending on it as well, so make sure you tune in for it!
title: Cole - Solo
